uploadVideoModalHeader.submitACommunityW:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the video submission modal
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal (header)
**When Users See This**: When the user opens the 'Submit a community workthrough' modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Submit a community workthrough"
thanksForSubmitting.thanksForSubmitting:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the success message after submitting a video
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal (success state)
**When Users See This**: After a user successfully submits a video for review
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "âœ¨ Thanks for submitting!"
thanksForSubmitting.approvedVideoMessage:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational message about video approval process
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal (success state)
**When Users See This**: After a user successfully submits a video for review
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "If your video gets approved, it'll show up in the Approaches section for the exercise."
thanksForSubmitting.noProblemImDone:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to close the success modal
**UI Location**: Upload Video Modal (success state)
**When Users See This**: After a user successfully submits a video for review, to dismiss the modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "No problem. I'm done here."
